ack.p: We are grateful to Dr. Asako Nomura of the local veterinary clinic for providing the feline ovaries and testes. This study was supported by a Grant-in-Aid for Young Scientists (B) No. 24780311 and a Grant-in-Aid for Science Research (C) No. 15K07747 from the Japan Society for the Promotion of Science. We also thank Nippon Medical & Chemical Instruments Co., Ltd. for providing the information on the used media.
